entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. 40 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
